docs.text: Introduction For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: For full documentation visit mkdocs.org .
docs.title: Introduction

docs.text: mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.
docs.title: Commands

docs.text: mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Project layout

docs.text: Login Enter your Username, Password and Click on Sign in to access your account. In case you forgot password, Click on Forgot password. Image 1 You should be redirected to this page once you click on Forgot Password: Image 2 Enter the email linked to your account, a recovery code will be sent to your email. Enter the recovery code and reset your password. Dashboard Once you login, you should see this page. This is your Dashboard which contains all the data summary and shortcuts to your account. Image 3 Image 4 Front Desk Admission Enquiry Image 5 Add admission enquiry form: Fill the details and click on save. The saved details should appear on the List of Admission Enquiries Shown in Image 5. Image 6 Visitor Book To check the Visitor List or Add new visitor, Go to Visitor book under Front Office. Image 7 Image 8 Phone Call log To check the Phone Call log or Add new Phone call log, Go to Phone Call Log under Front Office. Image 9 Image 10 Postal Dispatch To check the Postal Dispatch history or Add new Postal Dispatch log, Go to Postal Dispatch under Front Office. Image 11 Image 12 Postal Receive To check the Postal Received history or Add new Postal Receive log, Go to Postal Receive under Front Office. Image 13 Image 14 Complain To view the list of complaints or add new complaints, go to Complain under Front Desk. Image 15 Image 16 Setup Front Office All the list Selection Options in the Front Office field can be set up here. For example, in image 7, Purpose field is a list selection. The list options for Purpose can be set up here. Same goes for Complain type, Source and Reference. Image 17 Student Information Student Details To narrow down the student searches, Search using filters e.g., Class, Section or Keyword. Image 18 Here, Choosing Class 2 to Search gives you the list of students in the 2nd Grade. If you want a Detailed Student Summary, click on Detail View. Image 19 When clicked on Detail view, it gives you the detail of the students studying in the specific grade, as shown in the screenshot below. Image 20 Student Admissions In order to add new student admission data, Go to Student Admission under Student Information and Fill in the required Fields. Image 21 This page should appear once you click on Import Student. Image 22 When you scroll down you will find a space to Fill the Class, section field and upload the CSV file. Fill the class and section field, upload your file in the given space and click on Import Student. This will save your student detail file according to Class and section. Image 23 Online Admission Under Student Information, Click on Online Admission to view the list of Online Admission Requests, Student details and Admission fee payment status, Enrollment status. Image 24 Class Image 25 Section Image 27 Delete Students Search the student you want to delete with the filter. Once you find the student, select and click on delete. Image 28 Student Categories Image 28 Student House Image 29 Dropout Students Dropout Reason Fees Collection Print Monthly Fees To Generate monthly fees of students, Go to Print Monthly Fee under Fees Collection. Click on the check box next to Admission No. to select all students or Select the check box next to the Admission No. of the Student you want to choose. Then click on Generate. Image 30 The Following Page should appear once you click on Generate. Click on Print if you want to Print the Fees. Image 31

Enter the recovery code and reset your password.
